title: Terraform IBM Modules
introduction: Infrastructure as Code (IaC) is a contemporary method to ensure predictable and consistent resource provisioning on cloud platforms. Employing Terraform IBM Modules (TIM) can significantly aid in scaling and deploying your solutions using the IaC approach. These modules provide reusable, adaptable components adhering to IBM Cloud's best practices. Additionally, consider exploring the IBM Cloud Provider plug-in for Terraform to further expand your capabilities.
